text: Daga kare ga kyujo shite miru to, miyo, kare-ra wa chijo ni oite seigi o anadotte fugi o okonau. Hitobito yo, anata gata no hangyaku wa tada jibunjishin'no tamashi o gaishi, gense no seikatsu de kyoraku o eru dakedearuga, anata gata wa sugu ni ware ni kaeru nodearu. Sonotoki ware wa, anata gata no okonatta koto o tsuge shiraserudearou
